text: Every thing was great wings especially good the pizza was good but a few didn't seem completely done a little doughy and  the pepperoni pizza I ordered with extra cheese was just plain cheese and didn't get the sauces I ordered and paid for …More

name: Sean Skally
text: Pizza was burnt and tasted off. The breadsticks were decent. The no-contact pick-up worked well, since no one came out to my vehicle so I had no contact with anyone. I used the app and tapped "I'm here" and even tried calling the store. I had to go inside to get my stuff.

name: Allison Martinez
text: If I could I would give them negative stars. The price of a pizza and 2lt of soda is over the top ridiculous!! I used to love Pizza Hut, even worked at one for almost a year but I will never call them to order pizza again. Sad very sad.

text: Loved it . Well cooked . Toppings evenly added . Tasted and looked great.

text: Placed order on used points and got 90cent wing deal and two pizzas came to $46. Get email order cant be placed. Go in side end up paying $69 for the same exact order except instead of double order of chesse sticks it was a single talk about sticking it to the customer

text:
Love Pizza Hut.Liked CisCo's also but they're gone
But the hut has always been the.best.

name: Tony Gilmore
text: They where fast. Didn't have a long wait. Cashier was very nice an polite.

name: Cynthia Watson
text: My family hadn't eaten at a Pizza Hut in years due to one of my children's food allergies. Boy have I missed this pizza! We ordered pizones and pasta (which my son can eat) and it was like reliving my youth all over again. The food was perfect and the delivery driver was so polite. We will definitely order again.

name: Brian Oker
text: The website says "There is no Pizza Hut that delivers to your area." Had to call it in. They have no problem coming here it seems. The site needs to be updated. …More

text: Don't order from here if you're hungry. Twice I've ordered from this location and I only live about a mile away took them 2 HOURS to get it here when I was told 45mins if I had known it would take that long I'd do pickup!! Food is good I guess but 2 hours seriously?

name: Brandon Riley
text: I am a regular customer of this particular Pizza Hut. My pizza is always ready when I come in to pick them up, they have never messed up my order, and the staff are really friendly. Sign up for an online account and Pizza Hut will email you promo codes for awesome discounts. Ultimately I rate this Pizza Hut, 5 out of 5 pepperonis.

name: El Changito Burrito
text: I have ordered from this location four times over the past month or so and have had nothing but excellent service and top notch pizza. The employees are always friendly and deliver pizza that is fast, hot, and delicious. I'm not sure I could ask for more.

text: Hit or miss quality at this location. First time was great service and food. Tonight, I ordered extra and didn't get it...pizza's crust was burnt, toppings didn't go out far enough...and I ordered hand tossed but it was much thinner this time. Didn't want to wait for a remake. I simply won't return here.
